metadata.name: "The Doors of Perception"
metadata.description:
"The Doors of Perception" is my animated oil painting that I turned into a VJ loop. Sound on!
- The name was inspired by the book "The Doors of Perception" by Auldos Huxley. This artwork is a story about personal transformation from the physical body into the spiritual and mindful version of yourself.
The original oil painting is available for inquiry as well on my website: www.kategoltseva.us
